body:
based on Django: Get list of model fields? and How do I randomly select an item from a list using Python? you might write up something like that:

import random

class Player(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    photo = models.ImageField()
    games = models.IntegerField()
    minutes = models.IntegerField()
    points = models.IntegerField()
    assists = models.IntegerField()
    rebounds = models.IntegerField()
    steals = models.IntegerField()

    def random_field(self):
        return random.choice([f.name for f in self._meta.get_fields()])
title: Django: get object's random atribute
